name: Hexagrow
description:
LudumDare 28

Procedural game.
Enemies are proceduraly created with hexagons.
Levels are proceduraly created with growing difficulty.
Cards you get are proceduraly generated.

YOU ARE A PROCEDURAL MULTICELLULAR MICROORGANISM !

You have 5 cards to mutate your microorganism. Use them wisely because...
You only get one card on each enemy.
